alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 11:42AM EST until December 13 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... New Hampshire... Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine...New Hampshire... Saco River At Conway affecting Oxford, Carroll and Cumberland Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at multiple campgrounds in the region. Water approaches homes along Bachelder Road and properties along Riverside Drive in Allenstown. Buck Street in Epsom floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 6.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 9.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
